attributes.action:
No deal on Brexit.
Make us free of All EU rule.
attributes.additional_details:
The EU will still control our waters and fishing rights.  Spain are blatantly pushing for dual control over Gibraltar...
This is just the surface. So much of this "deal" is being kept under wraps...i personally dont see how this is in any shape a fair deal for our great nation which is already suffering.
Dont think for a secind its better than a no deal.
No deal means were taking back control.
It wont be easy...but nothing is. 
We need to invest back into our own country,  businessess and agriculture, fishing,  put money back into the NHS, support our veterans and our elderly. Deport any prisoners that are not British citizens,  charge for nhs treatment to non British citizens...come on people. Im no MP far from it but we need to get control back and learn to thrive again
attributes.background: Teresa May is trying to push through a deal with the Eu whuch will still keep us under EU laws.   .
